name: Sloth
text:
Good evening...

I vegetated here as quiet as I could...
a few hours after I woke up this afternoon...
because I have a very important errand...

the thing is that I should have celebrated the Day of the Drowsers with my bear friends the Koala and the Lemur...
a couple of years ago...
and I thought it would have sounded dreamfully with an underlying pedal point...
positiveFeedback: What a deep kaleidoscopic dream I thought I just scented just outside the corner of my ear, excellent...
negativeFeedback:
Argghhh...

A thousand nails of sunshine stinging through my poor eardrums!

[falls to the ground, exhausted]
neutralFeedback: We all dreamt well that day, long and sleepy dreams. Sometimes I wonder, however, how the day really was beyond my closed eyes and open ears.
